data.text: Angʼo momiyo ichungʼ gichien, yaye Jehova Nyasaye?
Ngʼat ma timbene richo goyo apedha ni joma onge nyalo
Dwache maricho mopando e chunye omiyo osungore;
Sunga omake ma ok onyal manye;
Owacho ne en owuon niya, “Onge gima nyalo yienga;
Dhoge opongʼ gi miriambo kod weche mag kwongʼ;
Okiyo ji e bath yore mag gwengʼ,
Okiyo ji kokichore ka sibuor mopondo;
Joma hapgi rach momako otieko kendo podho chuth,
Owachone en owuon niya, “Nyasaye wiye osewil;
Angʼo momiyo ngʼama timbene richo jaro Nyasaye?
To in, yaye Nyasaye, ineno chandruok gi kuyo,
Tur bad ngʼama rach ma timbene richo;
Jehova Nyasaye en Ruoth mochwere manyaka chiengʼ;
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, in iwinjo kwayo mar joma chandore;
Ichwako nyithi kiye kod joma isando,
